content.detailedDescription: I've been very reluctant about posting this, but after watching "i know what i saw" tonight, i decided it's time. i like to sit outside when the sun is setting and watch for things in the sky (hubble, iss, satellites, ect....), this one night, i was sitting in my chair looking due west when from the north appeared 2 extremely large ufos heading southwest. they appeared to be somewhere near the edge of the atmosphere and if i had to guess, each would be approx. 3-5 miles across. as they headed from the north to southwest, they were crisscrossing with each other and then just vanished! the whole event lasted about 4 seconds. they were silver in color with a black center and had what looked like multiple cracks on the underside. the sun was also reflecting off of them, giving them a gold/yellowish/orange appearance. a month or so later i was watching ufo hunters and realized that what i had seen was done in an animation for the show.You can view it on youtube "ufo hunters giant ufo's 1/5 :25". pause at the 25 sec mark. i've had 2 sightings prior to this and 1 since, all different, but this is the most vivid of them all!
content.summary: 2 giant ufos

content.detailedDescription:
It was on a sunday evening and i was in my home in charleston, s.C.I was in my art studio doing a commissioned painting of the blessed virgin mary. all of a sudden, i saw three real old little men in the corner of my studio.  they were wrinkled and i knew they must be at least 90 years old.  they looked at me with deep compassion in their eyes as if they were anxious to see how i would react to their appearance.
they immediately started talking to me through mental telepathy.  
i was at that time teaching about 75 people at a fitness center. i was teaching them meditation.
these were there words, "the most important thing your world can learn is meditation because it will lift your vibrations to a higher consciousness.
thank you for teaching this to your people."
i cried and thanked them for thanking me and then before i could look up and wipe the tears from my eyes, there was sort of a flashing light and they were gone."

no one will believe me, even though i am well known and well respected by my students and clients all over the world.  when i see persons talking about ufos and their experiences on television, i never see anyone who has had a face to face meeting with these wonderful people and who has had a conversations with them.

i have reason to believe that i will be contacted again soon.  i can't tell you how or why i feel this, but dr. hynek's name has been brought to my attention many times in the last several weeks.

i am not a kook; i am a very respected medium.  www.Elizabethbaron.Com
i believe there are good and bad aliens and this is not the only encounter i have had but i won't bore you with the other, but i believe they are here to warn us of coming disasters and they want to make that disaster a less catastrope because the greater our devastation, the more it will affect all the planets.

if you know of someone who has had this same experience or if you could communicate with me, i would appreciate it.  my email is ldylion112@aol.Com

love and light,
elizabeth baron
content.summary: My experience

content.detailedDescription: All the times and the date are approximate it was in the middle or late summer and i had got off work at about midnight and was going to ironton to cruise with my friends. as i was driving east on old us 52 i noticed a blue chevy cavilere in front of me hit his breaks and slow down then take off like a shot about that time my car started acting like it was stalling out and i pulled onto an old access road to the dow chemical company in lawrence county where my car finally died and i couldn't get it started. i got out of the car and raised the hood not knowing what to do because it was dark and very desolate on that streatch of road at that time of night. i remember there was a high fog bank and it was near the treetops. as i was looking at my car i started getting an eerie feeling that i wasn't alone out there and i figured it was just my nerves then i notice a hum..Not hearing it more feeling it in my body like a vibration. then i notice a "strobe" thats how it looked over the road i had just came down. i slowly looked up and my whole outlook on life suddenly changed. there was a light there..It was on constantly yet ever few seconds it would strobe flash. it was in this fog bank but i could make out the edges because they were darker than the rest of the sky above me then as the light flased again i noticed another light out of the corner of my eye do the same. this thing was huge!! almost as big as the field it was hovering over. and as i looked around i saw another light off in the distance but it didn't flash. i stood there staring with my jaw dropped thinking how insignificant i was, how small and unimportant everything i did or ever will do was i wanted to laugh and cry at the same time. i stood there for a few minutes in shock then the thing moved! the lights as one unit move together up deeper into the fog and all i can see is the lights. there is another flash of the lights and it heads off to the north east at a pretty good rate of speed never making a sound but the fog swirled around it as it pulled up and away. not thinking i jump in my car and turn the key and it starts right up as if nothing had happen. i back out of the access road and start driving fast back to my home so i can tell someone about this as i look out my window to the east i see this thing topping the hills near us 52 and as it does it flashes again and is gone. this event is something that i will never forget. the size of this thing was impossible to be flying. i've only told a few people about this and of course they all act the same way so i never reported this until now and only because i watched the show on history i know what i saw and there are people there that are reporting something like what i saw. the one i saw didn't have the red light in the center but those pictures they show on the program was it..You can't tell the size of the object in the picture but thats it. i don't have any ideas as to what i saw i just know that on that night i changed, i had no fear of the object just awe and to this day i still catch myself looking up into the sky and especially in that area i still slow down and look around.
content.summary: Triangular shaped object over a chemical plant

content.detailedDescription:
As i looked (west) out the window, a rising orange light caught my eye. at first i wondered if it was a planet. i stepped out side to take a closer look, and noticed that it was moving. i watched the orange light quickly move upward arching slightly.

my first reaction to this object was , that it was moving abnormally quick. after watching it for a few seconds, i went inside to find my roommate, (who was asleep)

 i noticed that the object had blinking lights of two different colors (i cant remeber which colors) , as it  moved closer to me. 

the object was headed east. 

i watched the object move across the sky, until it moved outside of my sight. i am not sure if it was in space, our inside earth. it passed right above the mooon, -right above it so its silhouette was not reflected. 
:/

*im not sure if this was a true ufo. i was just extremely bewildered about its speed. not only was this aircraft moving very fast, but as it had passed over me, it produced hardly any sound/noise. 

because i have never seen anything like this before i figured that i should at least tell someone about it.
content.summary: Extremely quick moving orange light

content.detailedDescription:
I came home from work late. i always love to look at the pond with the moonlight shining on it and after the crap day i'd had, i was doubly happy to see something that didn't cost anything and didn't want a piece of my time. as i was looking at the sky and smiling, i saw the ufo overing over the trees/pond next to my house. it seemed to be high up in the air and it was a very large looking craft. there were a few clouds and the moonlight seemed to bounce off the clouds and outline the craft. it wasn't close to the shape of an airplane or anything i've seen before.

i watched it for about 20 seconds and it moved slowly upward and off to the west. it went over the trees, gaining speed and suddenly zipped away. i thought it was pretty neat. i didn't feel out of the ordinary when it left or since seeing it.
content.summary: Similar to the close encounters shape. fewer lights. high up.

content.detailedDescription: Observed several objects in sky, initially stationery, with multi-colored lights rotating across each sphere in several different areas of sky.  after 15-20 minutes of observing objects, they began to move about the sky.  one moved in rapid zig-zag patterns horizontally and then became stationery again for another 20 minutes or so.  the others began to move in lateral lines, but far too rapidly to be a terrestrial vehicle.  there was no sound connected with movement or stationery periods.  the ones which moved in straight lines would stop after moving across ~15 degrees of the sky and remain stationery for up to 10 minutes before moving again.  this pattern repeated for just over an hour, when the objects dropped below the horizon to the north and east.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Several objects; sphere shaped, multi-colored rotating lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside taking my dog for a walk, and noticed some crows circling around. i thought that was odd, because i rarely see them so close, but while i was looking up at them, i noticed this long and skinny looking object flying. 

first, i thought it was an airplane, as the sun was fairly bright and i couldn't see too well, but i listened and did not hear anything. so i stared at it until i could see it better, and saw there were no wings or flashing lights as a plane would have.

from where i could see, the whole side of it looked "flat", or at least there were no obvious bumps to cast shadows.. it looked white on the side, from where the sun was shining on it.

i thought maybe it was a blimp, but it moved too fast to be that, so, i'm not really sure what it was.. i wanted to run inside and grab my camera, but i didn't think i would have time before it dissapeared. 

the object was flying in a straight path, it didn't seem to waver up or down. i lost sight of it when it flew out of my view.

i've often seen black military helicopters flying in the same direction. there are no military bases around here, but we are located between two major cities.

i've never seen anything such as this, and thought i should report it. it would be nice to know if someone else spotted the same thing.

thank you.
content.summary: Object was long and slender, reflecting light.

content.detailedDescription: I dont realy want to tell the story in writing!!!!!!!!
content.summary: Comunication, us invalvment

content.detailedDescription:
This happened approximately in 1997. i was laying on a beach on the north shore of oahu hawaii. since i was laying on my back i was looking up at the sky otherwise i would never have noticed this object. i was looking at the clouds when suddenly i noticed what appeared to be a silver object that looked like a "bb" just hanging far up in the sky. it was very small and if i looked away i had to look very hard to find the object again. it was almost noon and it was a very suuny day with light clouds passing over. i watched the object for at least thirty minutes and it did not move. at this time i went home and got a video camera and returned to the exact spot on the beach. i layed down in the same spot and again found the object still in the same area. i was able to video about one minute before cloud moved in and covered the area.
 i work in law enforcement and the next day while on the job i told my beat partner about the sighting. he was laughing about it until as we were looking up in the sky we both spotted the object again! we were in the ewa beach area of the island about 20 miles from where i had seen the object the day before. after watching the object for some time we decided to go to the pacific tsunami warning center which is located in the sector and see if they had any type or radar that might be able to detect the object. 
 upon our arrival at the center we were met by a gentleman who claimed to be a phyicist and the director of the facility. it was close to noon and very hot outside but the doctor and several other workers came outside to look at the object. we all spent at least an hour looking at the object even to the point of using my sniper rifle with a very high power scope to observe it. the doctor seemed truely fascinated by the object and commented that he might contact cheyenne mountain to see if they had it on radar. since it was very hot outside we finally left and the doctor told us that he would make some calls and for us to come back in a day or two so he could tell us about his findings. so the next day we came back and met with the doctor agian but this time he seemed to be in a big hurry and didn't want to give us the time of day. he quickly told us that what we had seen was venus and that he had to go to a meeting. it seemed like he was just brushing us off. i also contacted all the agencies in the area that launch weather ballons and learned that there were none up during the time we same the object (most are launched at night and explode by 0200 to 0300 hours).
 a few years later i was getting my pilots license and while walking out to the plane at the honolulu international airport i saw the object again! this time it was earlier in the morning, about 0900 hours. it appeared to be a little lower this time and was almost over the tower (as seen from the general aviation ramp side). my instructor and another pilot saw the obect. my instructor contact the tower and asked if they had the object on radar, their answer was negative. after taking off we were no longer able to find or see the object.
 i found it hard to beleive the doctors explaination that this object was venus. i have never heard of being about to see planets with the naked eye in the middle of the day with the sun burning bright. 
 this object appeared to be sphirical in shape and looked mettalic like a bb. it was not bright and if you looked away from it you had to look really hard to find it again, so it must have been really high or really small. since the airport radar did not pick it up i am guessing that it was higher that the class b radar could detect or it was undetectable.
content.summary: Observed a silver "bb" high in the sky for several days, it did not move.

content.detailedDescription: Was located 3460 hurly street phila.Pa.                                                                         during ww2 was comon tosee spotlights fropm groud ,always had alight beem from the ground up airplane or on the clouds . these three discs of light did not,that is why i thought they    were a new type of antiaircraft search light.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Was young,wwtwo was over thought the three discs of light were a new antiaircraft search light since there was not a colum of light going up to disc as a usual searchlight has.This also seen by my bruther ray,who later told me thestory. several neighbors

content.detailedDescription:
My husband had taken the dog out to do his nightly business.
i was standing on the balcony of the house that attaches to our bedroom.
my husband said to me "hunny come down here. there's a weird planet. youll probably know what it is". then he asked me if i knew if there was a cellphone tower nearby and i replied that i thought there was indeed one nearby and that could be it.
when i came down and met him outside,i realized that the direction where he was pointing there was no cellphone tower. i did see the large globe on the horizon. it pulsed and glowed a very bright red,but when it got closer(coming from the west) to us,it seemed to pulse back and forth between red and orange almost at the same time. i agree with my husband that it seemed to have some intelligence about it,because it seemed to come toward us once we started focusing on it and talking about it. 
when it got above the tree next to our house and was coming down over top of us ,i said to my husband "thats it! show's over! these things can give you cancer!"  i don't know why that was the first thing that came to my head,but as soon as i said that,the thing disappeared. my husband and i have differing viewpoints on this part of the experience,because he thinks it just faded down to a pinpoint,but to me it seemed to shoot straight up in the air into a pinpoint. then it completely disappeared and has not returned since. 
our family has had several strange encounters over the years. i've always wondered if they're tied into one another somehow.
content.summary: Large orange-red sphere came down over us

content.detailedDescription:
Around 3:00pm i was watching my cat sitting in the yard from inside my house, looking out a sliding glass door. he was looking out into a field and then looked straight up. his ears went flat and his eyes were big and he ducked down and quickly ran to a tree to climb but stopped halfway looking up all around. at that moment a saw a reflection of a black oval (off of a camper shell window in the driveway) moving away to the left. i have tall trees all around the house but only the sky can be seen in the reflection. i went and picked up the cat and he was trembling and shaking. later that night at exactly 9:50 i went outside to feed the cat, as i stepped out of the door i saw something flashing colorful lights just off the porch steps in the yard no bigger than a baseball. it was very dark and i took 2 steps towards it and noticed that it was being held by "something" about 1 to 2 feet tall. i was startled and jumped back and at the same time the "thing" was startled too and dropped the flashy thing and ran away super fast. i looked where "it" dropped the flashy light thing cause it was right in front of my pumpkin patch. i heard it hit the ground and later believe it bent a pumpkin leaf stem.
nothing there. i was terrified by then and went inside to collect my self.
content.summary: Oval craft scared my cat / strange blinking lights in my yard later that night.

content.detailedDescription:
My friend brad was getting ready to tape a marching band compitition in brownsberg indiana and was worried about the rain that was moving into the area. 
as he looked up to check the sky for the impending weather he caught a glimpse of 4 sphere's in the sky that did not appear to be moving.

puzzeled he started asking the guy in front of him if he could see the objects and the guy replied that he also saw the objects.

brad turned on his camera,still trying to come up with an explanation as to why these things were there video taped about 43 seconds of the objects before a fast moving cloud bank covered them up.

we have let some airport people see the video and they say it's not aircraft.
this sighting occured at 3:30 in the afternoon with blue skys.

the first idea brad had is that it could be the big dipper,but at 3:30 in the afternoon with blue skys?
we have also ask a few people that we know about that theory and no one that we know thought that was right either.
the skys were blue that day except for the clouds that you can see rolling in quickley in the video.
we don't have an explanation and thought you guys might interested in seeing the video.
we would appreciate you letting us know what your conclusions are if any, thanks, david webb
content.summary: While at a marching band competition the camera man for the band video taped 4 ufos?

content.detailedDescription:
I live in phoenix az at time of the ufo .Been ther for 4 yrs. from ct.
we live on 2385 west turney ave phoenix az.
 my son,me,my wife were watching tv. my neighbors came over and told me to go out side. went out.Went to clear open parking lot at condo complex.Looked up and saw over camel hump mtn was a triangle shaped something.Hovered quietly. for 20 something mins. then 3 round lights came out on right(my right looking at craft) and slowly moved fron a triangle shape to dancing balls in the sky. when the little lights came out the big lights dimmed out. we watch the lillte lights moved frm big to small making shapes then dissappeared back into the big set of lights.

when we watch the whole thing every hair on your body was standing up.
my son wanted in, was 3 yrs old.
content.summary: Long bomerang shaped..Plus 3 fyling round lights triangle

content.detailedDescription:
From our back deck at our townhouse on amber lane in west chester, pa., my boyfriend and i witnesses sparkling whitish lights in a cluster of trees that buts up against a small waterway.  we wrote the insident off initally as being a mating territory for lightning bugs, which it resembled, however we both never saw anything like it before and found that this explanation to be questionable.  when we saw the ufo special where the woman in bucks county described the "christmas lights" we  both got goosebumps because her description was uncanny to our experience.  what we witnessed was what appeared to be hundreds of thousands of lightning bugs hovering and floating on and around the tree branches.  the lights were twinkling, but not blinking intermittently like lightning bugs do.  it looked like sparkles all over the leaves.  we didn't think to grab the video camara.  we sat on the deck for several minutes watching from about 60 ft length.  it's odd to me in hindsight that we wrote it off as lightning bugs and didn't try to film.  i seemed so convinced at the time it was lightning bug mating but after researching lightning bugs, it is clear to me that it was not them.  
i wanted to share this because i was compelled to contact you after watching the bucks county woman share her description of what she witnessed.  the simulated images that were generated we're exactly the same thing we saw.  

it gets even stranger for us because this same woman also saw lights in the sky that were the same as something we a few years after this event at my house on north concord rd. in west chester.  we saw from our back deck what i can easily describe as exactly the same thing the bucks county woman saw in the sky.  three, then four round lights moving slowly in geometric patterns, sometimes coming together and then merging back with one another.  the simulated video of what she witnessed was exactly what me, my boyfriend and his brother saw.  the lights appeared to be attached to something which was oddly shaped.  it was close to us at one point, maybe 30'.  again, we stood there watching it intently but never grabbed a camara.  i didn't have a video camara available at my house anyhow and a still photo wouldn't have done it justice anyhow.  it was just the movement of the lights in what appeared to be a planned, geometric pattern that convinced us of it not being a typical aircraft. this happened in the early summer of 2007 around 9 or 10pm.
content.summary: "christmas lights" in a cluster of trees about 50' in diameter; same as reported by bucks county woman

content.detailedDescription:
while at baugher's farm market(orchard)in westminster maryland (carrol county) 3 october 2009 aprox.4:30 pm, my wife asked me to photograph a very large bird that she saw(a hawk flying and circling above. it was these images that we unknowingly captured some of the objects.
 later this day, at home and reviewing the images, we noticed that there were more objects in the sky than just the bird, tube-like or cigar shaped; depending on the perspective they could be oval or circular, but in the images they appear to be the size of a greyhound bus or larger,maybe a 1.5 to 2 miles away, 35 to 45  degrees above horizon in one photo (maybe the size of a boeing 727)they are some distance away. we found at least three in one photo, and at least one in another photo.All of the photos that we took this day were within a time-frame of an hour and a half to two hours and from differing perspectives and different zoom settings with the camera, so i'm sure that these could be of interest to someone for further study... if anyone is interested in seeing them  they are welcome. as for now, i am not making any assumptions. i just want to put it out there and let others decide what they want to think about them.

as for the ufo q&a's...
1.We were at the orchard picking apples and taking photos.
2.We noticed these objects after the fact while at home and reviewing the photos of the day when we noticed the anomalies in more than one photo which were taken at least 10 minutes apart and from differing degree angles and azimuths, lens settings and zooms.Nikon d40x 10.2 mega pix w/ 55-200 nikor vr lens. 
3. at first i thought perhaps the objects were birds, but then realized that they were something else other than birds much larger.
4.According to the photos they are all seemingly the same size,  and viewed from differing altitudes and angles from our vantage points, all images include the anomalies at differing pitch and attitude from each other. 
5.My feelings are unchanged reactions are intrigue and wonder. im going to get my camera checked out soon! 
6. have not lost sight of it ... found it after inspecting the photographs

*note: these attached images are small cropped-in portions of the originals obviously these particular modified to some point ,only to illustrate what we have seen... the originals have not been modified and are much larger then these in size and resolution and contain landmarks which may help to determine size distance and whatever else... 
**"1.Jpg" is a cropped portion of "dsc_8566.Jpg" taken a fraction of a second before "2.Jpg", no anomaly. the original has not been altered.
***"2.Jpg" is a cropped portion of "dsc_8567.Jpg".I have increased the gamma on the hilights+.10 and zoomed in to illustrate the object better.The original has not been altered.
(this was taken ~.5 hours after the bird image(dsc_8631.Jpg))
****image "3.Jpg.Jpg" is cropped from dsc_8631 5 items that i have seen on thios image. 3 unidentified flying objects, some trees in the bottom right corner, and a bird (that my wife asked me to take the picture of)
content.summary: Several unidentified objects caught in sky portion of family outing still photos. all are similar shape size&aprox. distance; caught in multiple images(digital photos)

content.detailedDescription:
while at baugher's farm market(orchard)in westminster maryland (carrol county) 3 october 2009 aprox.4:30 pm, my wife asked me to photograph a very large bird that she saw(a hawk flying and circling above. it was these images that we unknowingly captured some of the objects.
 later this day, at home and reviewing the images, we noticed that there were more objects in the sky than just the bird, tube-like or cigar shaped; depending on the perspective they could be oval or circular, but in the images they appear to be the size of a greyhound bus or larger,maybe a 1.5 to 2 miles away, 35 to 45  degrees above horizon in one photo (maybe the size of a boeing 727)they are some distance away. we found at least three in one photo, and at least one in another photo.All of the photos that we took this day were within a time-frame of an hour and a half to two hours and from differing perspectives and different zoom settings with the camera, so i'm sure that these could be of interest to someone for further study... if anyone is interested in seeing them  they are welcome. as for now, i am not making any assumptions. i just want to put it out there and let others decide what they want to think about them.

as for the ufo q&a's...
1.We were at the orchard picking apples and taking photos.
2.We noticed these objects after the fact while at home and reviewing the photos of the day when we noticed the anomalies in more than one photo which were taken at least 10 minutes apart and from differing degree angles and azimuths, lens settings and zooms.Nikon d40x 10.2 mega pix w/ 55-200 nikor vr lens. 
3. at first i thought perhaps the objects were birds, but then realized that they were something else other than birds much larger.
4.According to the photos they are all seemingly the same size,  and viewed from differing altitudes and angles from our vantage points, all images include the anomalies at differing pitch and attitude from each other. 
5.My feelings are unchanged reactions are intrigue and wonder. im going to get my camera checked out soon! 
6. have not lost sight of it ... found it after inspecting the photographs

*note: these attached images are small cropped-in portions of the originals obviously these particular modified to some point ,only to illustrate what we have seen... the originals have not been modified and are much larger then these in size and resolution and contain landmarks which may help to determine size distance and whatever else... 
**"1.Jpg" is a cropped portion of "dsc_8566.Jpg" taken a fraction of a second before "2.Jpg", no anomaly. the original has not been altered.
***"2.Jpg" is a cropped portion of "dsc_8567.Jpg".I have increased the gamma on the hilights+.10 and zoomed in to illustrate the object better.The original has not been altered.
(this was taken ~.5 hours after the bird image(dsc_8631.Jpg))
****image "3.Jpg.Jpg" is cropped from dsc_8631 5 items that i have seen on thios image. 3 unidentified flying objects, some trees in the bottom right corner, and a bird (that my wife asked me to take the picture of)
content.summary: Several unidentified objects caught in sky portion of family outing still photos. all are similar shape size & aprox. distance; caught in multiple images (digital photos).

content.detailedDescription: On the night of october 2, 2009 at 8:30 pm a friend and i were driving down virginia beach blvd. towards military hwy. to my left (i was driving) i noticed bright flashing lights (five in total, and in the shape of a pentagon when all were on). initially, i assumed that they belonged to a tall antenna, however, i found their rapid, random pattern of flashing to be unusual. it soon became apparent that it was not an antenna, but a craft of some kind, moving toward the horizon to my ne in a rather erratic up & down motion. i pointed the object out to my friend, who noticed it immediately, since it was quite bright (the lights had roughly the same color as an led). eventually, the object disappeared behind a line of trees, we attempted to locate it without success. though my friend and i both had cell phones equipped with cameras, we were too awed to think of taking a picture. i myself was quite stunned, since i had, up till that point, considered myself a skeptic and scoffed at the idea of ufos. though our area is one that is well known for the many aircraft that inhabit the sky, both the light patterns and its erratic flight behavior have caused me to classify this as a ufo.
content.summary: Five unidentified lights (probably belonging to one craft), flashing in a rapid, random pattern.

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my front yard admiring a beautiful night, the sky was bright due to a full moon and there was a giant white cloud covering a large portion of the sky.  to the northeast, which looked to be somewhere (possibly) over point reyes, i saw what looked to be a very bright star.  i was going out to empty the trash.  i went back into the house & returned the garbage can & decided after a few minutes to go out and take another look.   i look to the sky at night quite a bit & i had no memory of anything being in that position before.  as i watched it, i noticed it was multi-colored with red, blue and green lights "streaking" out of it.  i ran into he house and got my binoculars and i could see the lights much better.  the shape was star like with glistening lights. what was odd is is that it never moved.  it stayed in that position for probably ten minutes and then, unfortunately, the call of nature turned into a roar and i had to go inside.  when i returned, it was gone.  i know for a fact it was not a plane or a helicopter as it stayed in an exact position for the fifteen minutes that i watched it.
content.summary: Bright star like object

content.detailedDescription: I was out in my front yard admiring a beautiful night, the sky was bright due to a full moon and there was a giant white cloud covering a large portion of the sky.  to the northeast, which looked to be somewhere (possibly) over point reyes, i saw what looked to be a very bright star.  i was going out to empty the trash.  i went back into the house & returned the garbage can & decided after a few minutes to go out and take another look.   i look to the sky at night quite a bit & i had no memory of anything being in that position before.  as i watched it, i noticed it was multi-colored with red, blue and green lights "streaking" out of it.  i ran into he house and got my binoculars and i could see the lights much better.  the shape was star like with glistening lights. what was odd is is that it never moved.  it stayed in that position for probably ten minutes and then, unfortunately, the call of nature turned into a roar and i had to go inside.  when i returned, it was gone.  i know for a fact it was not a plane or a helicopter as it stayed in an exact position for the fifteen minutes that i watched it.
content.summary: Bright star like object

content.detailedDescription:
I was about 12 yrs old at the time and had been interested in astronomy for about a year.
it was about 7pm and my parents and i were walking to our car parked on the street.
i was always looking at the stars and that night was no different.
i saw what was a dull lite object moving very slowly almost right above me.
as i stared at it i saw that it was boomerang shaped with lights along the edges. maybe about 4 or 5 lights on each side.
i told my parents and they were in the car already.
told me to get in the car and that was it.

i don't think i have told many  this story since but have recently started reading about ufo's. found your website and reported it.

the sighting has always been on my mind for all these years.

thanks for giving me the opportunity to finally tell someone that will listne.
content.summary: This bright object did not belong

content.detailedDescription:
i was sitting under my car port and i always look out at the big clouds passing by. it is a hooby that i do to pass the time before i eat supper my wife and i always eat early supper.

       and as i looked up on the left side of the carport i saw two shining cyliner shape objects flying in and out of a great big white and light gray looking cloud and all of the clouds were so low until i sad to my self i could reach up and took it.  an at that moment one flying object went inside of the big cloud and the other one went inside of a smaller cloud and nitherone of them came back out of the clouds and i sat there and i wacthed the clouds passing on by. and i was thinking damn i just saw two flying objects and my wife would not belive me if i told her. two cyliner shape objectwith a red band half way of the objects.
content.summary: My first ufo event

content.detailedDescription: The ship just appeared, its lights were red. but once it got in to a random house. the lights begin flicking yellow. then it permanently turned yellow. then a green beam came out of the bottom. a green light emitted from the house's windows. i checked the house for any lifeforms. they was long gone. the next day they was back. ((the humans)).  i noticed it by it making a loud whooosh sound (maybe coming from a wormhole or something) when the green beam came out. a large noise occurred. (it sounded like a car hitting another car, with a explosion). the ship then mysteriously vanished. most likely use of a cloaking device.
content.summary: It came out of nowhere.

content.detailedDescription: my daughter taja spotted them first as we were headed back from wal-mart flying over the mountains between glenn haven and box prairie. she stated she saw 7 total but i only saw four by the time i parked he van. they were moving slowly from south to north and back. two broke away and came east over fort collins but returned to meet back with the others. we parked the van on a remote country road to watch for 30 minutes. i wish  i had broght my camera or zoom binociars in with me but i did not. with sunset not too far away an hour or less we had a great reflection off all objects. these are by far the largest ufos i have seen to date and remind me of the ones that flew over tucson feb 15, 2009 . my daughters first so she will remember forever at age 10. i wonder why seeing them from our angle was so easy yet wonder why something this large cannot be seen from below perspective. there was a slight hase of polution in the air but not enough to mask these objects at the size. i had groceries to get home so we left hoping there would be others reporting on these from other locations. maybe people just don't look up too often at the sky especially in the day time. i also noticed we had almost a full moon and wonder if the ufos leverage this to their advantage on these nights.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: 5 large triangle ufos moving as thought they were scanning ground

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my front porch smoking a cigarette and i just happened to look up and i saw a bright white light headed directly upwards. it was going slow, as a matter of fact i couldnt see it moving it seemed to move while i was not looking. i watched for about five minutes as the light moved even more and i thought it could just be a star but it was too bright and visibility was not good and i had to look really hard to see any stars. this was shaped like a five point "stick" star and was irregularly bright. i came inside to get my camera and when i went back outside to take a picture, i aimed my camera and i could see the craft through my screen but when i actually took the picture i couldnt see the light anywhere. i changed my settings on my camera and took pictures with every kind of flash so that it wasnt "poor flash" and i managed to get a picture with a view of the light but it was much smaller than what it should have been.
content.summary: Bright white odd shaped light heading straight upwards towards outer space

content.detailedDescription:
We were headed to new braufels for a 5-day getaway for our anniversary.  as we were nearing our destination, we were driving through round rock, tx on i-35 south, and i saw these lights ... about 3 white ones, and 2 red ones just hanging there above the interchanges.  at first, i thought it was just a slow-moving plane; however, as we came closer, i said to my husband, "look! it's just hanging there!"  he said, "it's just a plane."  i responded that planes "just don't hang" in the sky; they must keep moving.  he said that it could just be "one of those military planes that can do that."  i said, "what exactly type of military plane can do that?"  he said he didn't know, but he was sure there was one.  the entire time we were having this conversation, i was watching this thing, and i kept telling him that it was still there, and it was not moving.  i said, "it's a ufo!"  he said he didn't think so.  i said, "if god can create our world and all of these people and give us the intelligence to create all that is around us, do you think he just did it for only earth?  i don't think so."  he said, "maybe; i don't know."  

as we continued to drive, we couldn't see it any longer.  i am a believer in ufos as my family saw them on a trip to colorado hovering over us for miles, darting back and forth.  i was about 10 years old at the time, but it is a vivid memory.  now, some years later, i see this thing just sitting stationary over a very busy city and interstate; it is something to think about!!
content.summary: It was just hovering/stationary over the interstate as we drove s on i-35

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching my tree and i
saw the object at 11: 50 pm. it was so surrounded by the clouds, came out and be hid. he is  playing. i not surprised since it is not the first time that happen to me.
i dont now if i imagine that he knows when im going to leve outside.
is the same object i've seen all these years.
content.summary: Ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I have a lot pictures of it who state more than i can express myself.

please, look at them and analyse them in order to see by yourself.

i've put the photos by night on my site. some don't have anything, but the else is quite shocking. from the ground, you couldn't notice those shape.

planes were flying under it, so it was high in the sky.

i also have the bright star in sighting since may of this year, and it move quite a bit, oftenly near midnight, somedays 23h00.

my site where you can download all the photos 
http://tubedecolle.Free.Fr/

i made a animation of the first night 
http://tubedecolle.Free.Fr/night01/film01.Html 

i hope you'll find them interresting and that the photos could help. 


best regards

ps: yesterday night was cloudy, so i couldn't see them.
i hope tonight will be clear, a friend lend me a camcorder, with tripod, may be i'll catch something on video.

i see them everynight since the 25 september of 2009.
what should i do ?
content.summary: The first sighting was very bright
